data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts a castle. I do not recall how I came to exist. I make noises when I sense someone in my vicinity.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
There's a chain here.
The spider and the the prisoner are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the prisoner to let my friend the demon into his head.
data.mid_motivation: I want the demon to infest the prisoner so he can force the prisoner to scream and slam his limbs and head on the cell door.
data.long_motivation: I want the prisoner to scream and slam his limbs so the guards will come running, and the demon can jump to a guard and get free of the dungeon.
